title: *** LUXURY 1 BED *** BALCONY *** GYM *** LAUNDRY *** ROOFDECK *** PRIM
posting_body: ['*** LUXURY 1 BED *** BALCONY *** GYM *** LAUNDRY *** ROOFDECK *** PRIME ASTORIA ***', 'Listing ID #: 212975', 'Address: 26-25 28th street, #3A', 'Price: $3,099', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Bicycle Room', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'New Construction', 'Receiving Room', 'Roof Deck', 'Storage', 'Subway', 'Virtual Doorman', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Balcony', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'NO FEE', 'Open View', 'Renovated', 'Brand New Luxurious 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment in the heart of Astoria.', 'Enjoy your own private balcony or head up stairs to the Rooftop Terrace where you have amazing views of Manhattan and Queens.', 'This unit features gorgeous kitchen with a breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave.', 'Stunning hardwood flooring and high ceilings.', 'Large Windows that bring in tons of sunlight.', 'The amenities for this building include: Balcony, Fully Furnished Roof-deck with BBQ grills, Gym, On-site Laundry room, (Parking Space available for rent) Located in the Heart of Astoria.', 'This is a prime location with everything you need just steps away, Just a 2 minute walk to N and W trains and 9 minutes away from midtown Manhattan.', 'Plenty of Restaurants, Grocery Stores to choose from.', 'Multiple gyms, lounges and coffee shops just around the corner for your convenience.', 'Listing contains stock photos Please refer to floorplan for exact layout-', 'all finishes and appliances are identical.', 'CALL OR TEXT TO VIEW TODAY 917-355-4162', 'Mashud Ahmed', 'Phone: (917) 355-4162', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (917) 355-4162 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Mashud Ahmed at (917) 355-4162']
